{"id":1274818870,"question_id":3436,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1717299634,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1274818870/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Subarray With Bitwise OR Closest to K","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimumDifference(int[] nums, int k) {\n        //10 : 1 0 1 0\n            \n        \n        int pre = nums[0];\n        \n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        int res = min;\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len; i++){\n            int n = nums[i];\n            \n            if(Math.abs((pre & n)-k) < min){\n                pre &= n;\n                \n                min = Math.min(min, Math.abs(pre-k));\n            }else if(i<len-1){\n                pre = nums[i+1];\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        pre = nums[len-1];\n        for(int i=len-1; i>=0; i--){\n            int n = nums[i];\n            if(Math.abs((pre & n)-k) < min){\n                pre&=n;\n                \n                min = Math.min(min, Math.abs(pre-k));\n            }else if(i>0){\n            \n                pre = nums[i-1];\n            }\n        }\n        return min;\n        // 5 : 1 1 1 \n        // 4 : 1 0 0\n        \n        // 6 : 1 1 0 , k==2\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-subarray-with-bitwise-or-closest-to-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
